summary: Provides an auto‑regressive greedy decoding engine for time‑duration transducer models, using supplied decoder and joint networks to emit token sequences stepwise and optionally retain alignment histories and per‑frame confidence (including duration confidence).
business_intent: Deliver fast, low‑latency inference for speech recognition or other sequence‑to‑sequence transduction applications, while offering optional diagnostic data (alignments, confidence scores) for quality monitoring or downstream processing.
